botMention.description:
### Hi, {user}! My name is {ayaka}
- **I am a bot designed to entertain your server with various minigames.**

economy.wallet: {targetUser} has: {pamonhas} pamonhas and is in position üèÜ #{userPosition} in the ranking!

pay.selfTransfer: You cannot transfer pamonhas to yourself.
pay.invalidValue: The value must be greater than zero.
pay.processing: An error occurred while processing the transfer.
pay.botTransfer: You can't transfer tamales to bots.

embed.description: The language has been set to English.

embed.title: Bot Help
embed.description: Hello, {username}! Here is some information about me.
embed.instructions: Use the buttons below to navigate through commands.

embed.description_init_game: Find all the pairs of emojis!
embed.description_finish_game: üíØ Congratulations! You completed the game in {attempts} attempts.

## End of the game!

{friendEmoji} {friend}: {friendScore} points

errors.timeout: {clock} Time's up! The game has ended.
errors.bot: You can't play cooperative with a bot!

embed.footer: Click the buttons to reveal diamonds or bombs!

errors.insufficient: You do not have enough pamonhas to make this bet.
